scripts.daml:rebuild: bun daml:token-standard-api && (cd ./daml && daml clean && daml build) && (cd ./daml/test && daml clean && daml build)
scripts.generate:daml-ts: rm -rf ./src/daml-ts && daml codegen js ./daml/.daml/dist/test-coin-1.0.0.dar -o ./src/types/daml-ts && bun daml-ts:install
scripts.daml-ts:install: for dir in ./src/types/daml-ts/*/; do (cd "$dir" && bun install); done
scripts.generate:all: rm -rf ./src/types/{daml-ts,openapi-ts} && bun daml:rebuild && bun generate:daml-ts && bun generate:openapi
